Contact and links¶

A forum/mailing list is available for Owlready on Nabble: http://owlready.8326.n8.nabble.com

In case of trouble, please write to the forum or contact Jean-Baptiste Lamy <jean-baptiste.lamy @ univ-paris13 . fr>
